    • Constructor Detail

      • FileStorage

        public FileStorage()
        Constructor Initializes internal state and settings. Does NOT attempt to do any file I/O operations yet. Instead, we let ModelManager control when to fire I/O operations.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> loadFile()
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              org.json.JSONException,
                                              java.text.ParseException
        loadFile Loads watdo.json file data as a String, and then parses it and returns the data as an ArrayList of TodoItems.
        Returns:
        Loaded ArrayList of TodoItems from file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Undefined message, caught by ModelManager constructor
        org.json.JSONException - Undefined message, caught by ModelManager constructor
        java.text.ParseException - Undefined message, caught by ModelManager constructor

      • updateFile

        public void updateFile(java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> todoItems)
                throws java.io.IOException
        updateFile Updates the content of the watdo.json file with the given data.
        Parameters:
        todoItems - The data to write to the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Messages are LOAD_FAILED, PARSE_FAILED, WRITE_FAILED

      • changeSettings

        public java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> changeSettings(java.lang.String fileDirectory,
                                                    java.lang.Boolean newRandomColorsEnabled,
                                                    java.lang.Boolean newNotificationsEnabled)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        changeSettings Changes this object's internal settings to the given ones, and then update the settings.json file with the new settings. Finally, this method will load the watdo.json data at the new directory.
        Parameters:
        fileDirectory - The new directory to load watdo.json at. Must not be null.
        newRandomColorsEnabled - The new random color display setting
        newNotificationsEnabled - The new notification setting
        Returns:
        ArrayList of TodoItems after loading the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - with WRITE_SETTINGS_FAILED

      • loadSettings

        public void loadSettings()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         org.json.JSONException
        loadSettings Loads settings from the settings.json file. Usually called only at program startup.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Message undefined, caught by ModelManager.
        org.json.JSONException - Message undefined, caught by ModelManager.

      • updateSettings

        public void updateSettings()
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           org.json.JSONException
        updateSettings Writes this object's current settings data to the settings.json file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Message LOAD_SETTINGS_FAILED, WRITE_SETTINGS_FAILED
        org.json.JSONException - Messsage undefined, caught by changeSettings

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName()
        getFileName
        Returns:
        The filename in use by the program. Always watdo.json.

        areRandomColorsEnabled
        Returns:
        The settings value for whether random color task display is enabled.

        areNotificationsEnalbed
        Returns:
        The settings value for whether notification display is enabled.

      • concatSlash

        private void concatSlash()
